example.text: Mr. Chairman, I rise today in support of HR 140, Protecting Speech from Government Interference Act, and I applaud and appreciate Chairman Comer bringing this bill forward. In a recent hearing held by the Oversight and Accountability Committee with former executives from Twitter, a clear and very disturbing pattern emerged: A coordinated effort between a privately owned social media giant and the Federal Government to suppress critical reporting ahead of the 2020 Presidential election.

I urge strong support for this legislation, and I am encouraged by Chairman Comer's commitment to thoroughly investigate the ever- increasing encroachment by Big Tech companies into the privacy and First Amendment rights of millions of Americans.
Madam Speaker, due to a district emergency, I was unavoidably detained from voting today. Had I been present, I would have voted ``yea'' on rollcall No. 143.
